snippet: A team began exhuming the remains of João Goulart, the Brazilian president ousted in a 1964 coup supported by the United States, to examine whether he was poisoned by spies.
abstract: Team of forensic experts begins exhuming remains of Joao Goulart, Brazilian president ousted in 1964 coup supported by United States, to examine whether he was poisoned by spies.
lead_paragraph: A team began exhuming the remains of João Goulart, the Brazilian president ousted in a 1964 coup supported by the United States, to examine whether he was poisoned by spies.

headline.main: Brazil: Forensic Team Exhumes Leader’s Remains
headline.print_headline: Brazil: Forensic Team Exhumes Leader’s Remains
